name: Treasure Hunter Fox
description:
Finally, my first 3D game!

(Well, more like a prototype, but it's more complete than anything 3D I've made before)

This project is basically a clone of Pac Man World 2 in terms of game mechanics but with new levels (was one of my favorite games as a kid). It is very short and was made as a way for me to practice 3D game design as well as learn how to use the Unreal Engine.

You will rev-roll off of ramps to cross chasms, trampoline high into the air, and squash snakes and spiders as you hunt for precious gems.

The gamepad controls are described in-game under the assumption that you're using an Xbox controller. If you're using something like a PlayStation controller instead, you can see where the buttons are on the Xbox controller, and they will be in the same place on yours (example: 'A' on Xbox is 'X' on PlayStation). I also recommend using a gamepad to play, if possible, but keyboard & mouse works fine too.

Credits

Code & game design by me

Butt-bounce sound effect by Sophie Martin (h_mA)
